result.title: SPOJ-PATULJCI PROBLEM(PERSISTENT SEGMENT TREE)
result.content:
I have tried to solve this problem through persistent segment tree. But i am getting wrong answer.

My logic: In a segment tree at a node i will traverse it's subtree which will have frequency greater than half of the segment.

Code: http://ideone.com/AXsFV4

Please look into the code and tell me what i am doing wrong. Thanks.
